lyrics.lyric: Kiss Me
lyrics.tlyric: 吻我

lyrics.lyric: It's hard to be a normal person, that's just not me
lyrics.tlyric: 我很难去做一个普通人，那根本不是我

lyrics.lyric: I'm writing a journal to keep my feelings hiding
lyrics.tlyric: 我写着一本日记，藏着我的感情

lyrics.lyric: Across the bridge, what would I see?
lyrics.tlyric: 走过那座桥，我会看到什么

lyrics.lyric: I wanna see it, dreaming my dreams
lyrics.tlyric: 我想去看看，梦着实现梦想

lyrics.lyric: Miracles, beautiful, here we go, all the way
lyrics.tlyric: 奇迹，美景，启程吧，一路走下去

lyrics.lyric: Running from my life ends now
lyrics.tlyric: 现在停止逃避自己的生活

lyrics.lyric: Used to keep holding back my thoughts
lyrics.tlyric: 过去一直压抑着我的思绪

lyrics.lyric: Would be wrong if you're gone
lyrics.tlyric: 没有你，我将会乱成一团

lyrics.lyric: Found my way through the stars
lyrics.tlyric: 在繁星中找到我的方向

lyrics.lyric: If I could reach to your heart
lyrics.tlyric: 如果我能触及你的心

lyrics.lyric: Money still can't buy me love
lyrics.tlyric: 金钱仍然买不到我的爱

lyrics.lyric: But there's still life when there's hope around
lyrics.tlyric: 但只要希望还在，生活就要继续

lyrics.lyric: Like a rainbow in the clouds
lyrics.tlyric: 像是云端的彩虹

lyrics.lyric: a gift from above
lyrics.tlyric: 像是从天而降的礼物

lyrics.lyric: Kiss me before sunrise
lyrics.tlyric: 在日出前亲吻我吧

lyrics.lyric: Or I'm leaving you tonight
lyrics.tlyric: 否则我今夜就要离开

lyrics.lyric: My love found a place
lyrics.tlyric: 我的爱找到了归宿

lyrics.lyric: To stay and rest, my bed
lyrics.tlyric: 就留下来在床上休息

lyrics.lyric: Always staying forever
lyrics.tlyric: 永远停留

lyrics.lyric: meant to be together
lyrics.tlyric: 就意味着相互陪伴

lyrics.lyric: If we could change this world
lyrics.tlyric: 如果我们要改变这世界

lyrics.lyric: Today with you
lyrics.tlyric: 就今天吧，和你一起

lrc.lyric:
[00:00.000] 作词 : nulbarich
[00:00.751] 作曲 : nulbarich
[00:01.502]origin: 《kiss me》--Carole & Tuesday
[00:05.751]cover/mix: 阿喵
[00:11.006]It's hard to be a normal person, that's just not me
[00:16.112]I'm writing a journal to keep my feelings hiding
[00:20.369]Across the bridge, what would I see
[00:22.873]Want to see it, dreaming my dreams
[00:25.625]Miracles, beautiful, here we go all the way
[00:30.634]Running from my life
[00:31.886]There's no use to keep holding back my thoughts
[00:34.637]Would be wrong if you're gone
[00:36.389]Find my way through the stars
[00:38.892]If I could reach to your heart
[00:41.145]Money still can't buy me love
[00:42.898]But there's still life and there's hope around
[00:45.901]Like a rainbow in the clouds, a gift from above
[00:50.156]Kiss me before sunrise
[00:54.663]Or I'm leaving you tonight
[01:00.169]My love found a place
[01:02.421]To stay and rest, my bed
[01:05.178]Always stay forever, meant to be together
[01:10.685]If we could change this world today with you
[01:18.685]Thanks for listening~

tlyric.lyric:
[by:火星人叫李白]
[00:01.502]出处:《吻我》——卡罗尔与星期二
[00:05.751]翻唱/混音：阿喵
[00:11.006]做一个平凡的人很不容易 因为那不是我本性
[00:16.112]我写下了一本日记 把我的心情藏进去
[00:20.369]穿过这座桥 我将会看见什么
[00:22.873]想去看看 在梦里梦到什么
[00:25.625]奇迹与美丽呀，我们一路走来
[00:30.634]逃离我的生活
[00:31.886]没有必要压抑我的想法
[00:34.637]如果你离开 这会是错吗
[00:36.389]星星指引我前进的路
[00:38.892]如果我能触及你的内心
[00:41.145]钱不能买到我的爱情
[00:42.898]只要还活着就有希望
[00:45.901]如同天上的彩虹 是上天赐予的礼物
[00:50.156]在日出之前吻我
[00:54.663]不然我将会在今晚离去
[01:00.169]我的爱找到了归宿
[01:02.421]留下来休息，我的床
[01:05.178]始终保持永远，意味着永远在一起
[01:10.685]如果今天我们能和你一起改变这个世界
[01:18.685]感谢倾听~
